name: listInterfaces
description: Gets a paginated, filtered, and sorted list of interfaces. Corresponds to GET /api/stations/v1/interfaces. Requires `stations:read` scope. [READ-ONLY]

limit.description: Limit the number of items listed

offset.description: Return documents after a certain offset

sort.description: Sort the result by name, lastModified.at, and created.at. Separate by comma. Specify descending sort with a - character
